techmeme.title: Robinhood plans to acquire crypto exchange Bitstamp for $200M, in a deal expected to close in H1 2025, and says Bitstamp will still operate under its own brand (Caitlin Ostroff/Wall Street Journal)
A look back at Sam Altman's career, starting as Loopt CEO before moving to YC and founding OpenAI in 2015, as many former allies now view his charm as duplicity (Ellen Huet/Bloomberg)
Sources: as Humane's Ai Pin flopped, with just ~10,000 orders by early April, the startup started talking to HP about a $1B+ sale; Humane has raised $240M (New York Times)
Slack launches Slack Lists, a new feature for paid users to integrate project and task management into the app, including helping to structure conversations (Mike Wheatley/SiliconANGLE)
Coinbase-backed advocacy group Stand with Crypto passes 1M members after targeting voters in swing states, including ~24K members in Georgia and 16K+ in Arizona (Andrea Shalal/Reuters)
